name: Fishy Food Chain
description:
Hi. I am a part time indie game developer from Norway. I typically make all the assets (3D models and UI), and write the code myself, which is why it takes a lot of time for me to make even small games. 

However, I do enjoy the process and would love to do this professionally at some point.

If you want to support me

If you would like to support me, you could do it in the following ways:

  1. Share my game with friends, or on your social media.
  2. Providing feedback (using the comment function), constructive criticism is always welcome!
  3. If you have the money and really want to, you could donate here on Itch. I might make a Patreon or SubscribeStar account in the future, if my projects start attracting enough people.
